subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Diode EVP Capture Device I built
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I don't think there's any connection other than relative ends of a scale 
he's creating.

Like saying the band Moxy Fruvous is sort of a cross between The Who and 
Tom Lehrer.  No other connection than that's the best way to describe 
them.
:-)

Zack

On Mon, 17 Nov 2008, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> Please, share you thinking with us. What is the connection between Edison and Houdidi?
